div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1590 Kishon River, near Haifa (anc. Sic- mona), Phoenicia, c. 1958 Burial: after 169 B.C. (Spaer) Contents: 100+ AE. Found during dredging Antiochus IV: Antiocheia (as Rois de Syrie 431-5) Disposition: A. Spaer, Jerusalem, 12 Information from A. Spaer
